Ralph Lemon (amụrụ n'ubochí mbụ n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1952 na Cincinnati, Ohio) bụ ónyé America na-eme ihe nkiri, ónyé nduzi ụlọ ọrụ, ónyé édémédé, onye na-ese ihe nkiri na ónyé na-ahụ màkà echiche

A zụlitere ya n'ebe okpukpe, ọ zụliere nka ya dị ka nwatakịrị. Na mbido ọrụ ya, Lemon jiri ihe osise mee ihe dị ka isi iyi nke nkwupụta, ka ọ na-achọpụta ịgba egwú, jiri mmegharị dị ka ụzọ anụ ahụ nke nkwupụta.
Lemon malitere ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya na akwụkwọ na ihe nkiri na Mahadum Minnesota
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1975, Lemon zụrụ Nancy Hauser, onye mechara gwa Lemon ka ọ sonye na ụlọ ọrụ ya
Tupu Lemon esonye, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Mixed Blood Theater Company na 1976, na Minneapolis. O mechara kwaga New York ebe ọ zutere ma gbaa egwu na Meredith Monk na ụlọ ọrụ ya
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbè ọ hapụsịrị ụlọ ọrụ Monk na 1985, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Ralph Lemon Dance

N'ime ogologo ọrụ ya, ya na ụlọ ọrụ ndị a ma ama dịka Limón Dance Company, Alvin Ailey's Repertory Ensemble, Geneva Opera Ballet, Jacob's Pillow Dance Ensemble, na Lyons Opera Ballet rụkọtara ọrụ. Lemon mekwara ihe nkiri vidio ya na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri Bebe Miller.

A na-ekwu na ọtụtụ ihe ịga nke ọma Lemon bụ ikike pụrụ ichè ya iji gosipụta ọdịnaya dị egwu na mmetụta uche site na mmegharị site na iji ụdị nka ọhụrụ. Ralph Lemon bụ ónyé nduzi nka nke Cross Performance Inc

na New York ugbu a. Lemon na-agba mbọ ịmepụta ma bụrụ ihe ọhụrụ na arụmọrụ ọ bụla ọ na-emepụta site na ịnye echiche dị ichè íchè na iji mgbasa ozi dị iche iche. A na-egosipụta isi nke ụdị Ralph Lemon n'ọrụ mbụ ya na ejiji siri ike na ihe nkwado iji nyere ndị na-ege ntị aka ịghọta akụkọ ahụ. Ka ọ na-erule mmalite afọ ndị 1990 ọ hapụrụ ụdị ihe nkiri gaa n'ụdị mmegharị site n'ilekwasị anya n'ahụ. Ralph Lemon na-eji ma nka ya na anthropology azụ iji metụta ihe nkiri ya, mana ọ na-ezere ịgbagọ mkpa ọdịbendị nke ịgba egwu n'ime ọdịnala.
